section.heading: Unemployment Compensation Study Commission on the Solvency of the District Unemployment Fund.

annoGroup.heading: Expiration of Law
annoGroup.text: Section 4 of D.C. Law 5-3, as amended by § 4 of D.C. Law 5-124, provided that except for provisions of § 2(a), (b), (d), (f)(2), (g), (h), (j), (1)(3), (m), (n), (o), (p), (q), (r), and (s) of D.C. Law 5-3, D.C. Law 5-3 shall expire on December 31, 1985.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 46-102.1 [1981 Ed.,] which derived from § 3 of D.C. Law 5-3, expired December 31, 1985.
